mapper.select: SELECT a.user_id AS userId, b.id AS shopId, b.parent_ids AS parentIds, IF((SELECT id FROM trains.report_user_consume WHERE user_id = a.user_id LIMIT 1),1,0) AS isExist FROM mtmydb.mtmy_users a LEFT JOIN trains.sys_office b ON a.office_id = b.id WHERE a.office_id IS NOT NULL AND a.office_id != ''
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO report_user_consume( user_id, shop_id, parent_ids, year, quarter, month, week, day, consume_sum, arrears_sum, appt_times )
SELECT t.user_id,#{list.shopId},#{list.parentIds},t.year,t.quarter,t.month,t.week,t.day,SUM(t.consumeSum),SUM(t.arrearsSum),SUM(t.apptTimes) FROM ( ( SELECT b.user_id, (SELECT YEAR(a.create_date)) AS 'year', (SELECT QUARTER(a.create_date)) AS 'quarter', (SELECT MONTH(a.create_date)) AS 'month', (SELECT WEEKOFYEAR(a.create_date)) AS 'week', (SELECT DAY(a.create_date)) AS 'day', SUM(a.app_total_amount) AS consumeSum, SUM(a.app_arrearage) AS arrearsSum, 0 AS apptTimes FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_details a LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_mapping b ON a.goods_mapping_id = b.rec_id WHERE b.is_real != 0 AND b.group_id = 0 AND b.user_id = #{list.userId}
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{date},'%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(a.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(SYSDATE(),interval 1 day),'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(SYSDATE(),interval 1 day),'%Y-%m-%d')
GROUP BY a.goods_mapping_id,b.goods_id,b.user_id,year,quarter,month,week,day )UNION( SELECT user_id, (SELECT YEAR(appt_date)) AS 'year', (SELECT QUARTER(appt_date)) AS 'quarter', (SELECT MONTH(appt_date)) AS 'month', (SELECT WEEKOFYEAR(appt_date)) AS 'week', (SELECT DAY(appt_date)) AS 'day', 0 AS consumeSum, 0 AS arrearsSum, COUNT(1) AS apptTimes FROM mtmydb.mtmy_appt_order WHERE appt_status IN (1,2,4) AND user_id = #{list.userId}
AND DATE_FORMAT(appt_date,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{date},'%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(appt_date,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(SYSDATE(),interval 1 day),'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(appt_date,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(SYSDATE(),interval 1 day),'%Y-%m-%d')
GROUP BY user_id,year,quarter,month,week,day ) ) AS t GROUP BY user_id,year,quarter,month,week,day
mapper.select: SELECT b.id AS shopId, b.parent_ids AS parentIds, IF((SELECT id FROM trains.report_shop_appt WHERE shop_id = a.office_id LIMIT 1),1,0) AS isExist FROM mtmydb.mtmy_users a LEFT JOIN trains.sys_office b ON a.office_id = b.id WHERE a.office_id IS NOT NULL AND a.office_id != '' GROUP BY a.office_id
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO report_shop_appt( shop_id, parent_ids, year, quarter, month, week, day, customer_sum, appt_sum, frequency ) SELECT a.shop_id, (SELECT parent_ids FROM sys_office WHERE id = a.shop_id) AS 'parentIds', (SELECT YEAR(a.appt_date)) AS 'year', (SELECT QUARTER(a.appt_date)) AS 'quarter', (SELECT MONTH(a.appt_date)) AS 'month', (SELECT WEEKOFYEAR(a.appt_date)) AS 'week', (SELECT DAY(a.appt_date)) AS 'day', IFNULL(b.customerSum,0), IFNULL(a.apptSum,0), IFNULL(b.frequency,0) FROM ( SELECT shop_id,appt_date,COUNT(1) AS 'apptSum' FROM mtmydb.mtmy_appt_order WHERE 1 = 1
AND DATE_FORMAT(appt_date,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{date},'%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(appt_date,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(SYSDATE(),interval 1 day),'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(appt_date,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(SYSDATE(),interval 1 day),'%Y-%m-%d')
GROUP BY shop_id,appt_date ) a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT shop_id,appt_date,COUNT(1) AS 'frequency',COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) AS 'customerSum' FROM mtmydb.mtmy_appt_order WHERE appt_status IN (1,2)
AND DATE_FORMAT(appt_date,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{date},'%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(appt_date,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(SYSDATE(),interval 1 day),'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(appt_date,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(SYSDATE(),interval 1 day),'%Y-%m-%d')
GROUP BY shop_id,appt_date ) b ON a.shop_id = b.shop_id AND a.appt_date = b.appt_date

INSERT INTO trains.report_beautician_achievement ( beautician_id, shop_id, parent_ids, year, quarter, month, week, day, achievement, service_times, service_charge ) SELECT a.beautician_id AS beauticianId, a.bea_office_id AS beaOfficeId, (SELECT parent_ids FROM trains.sys_office WHERE id = a.bea_office_id) AS parentIds, (SELECT YEAR(a.update_date)) AS 'year', (SELECT QUARTER(a.update_date)) AS 'quarter', (SELECT MONTH(a.update_date)) AS 'month', (SELECT WEEKOFYEAR(a.update_date)) AS 'week', (SELECT DAY(a.update_date)) AS 'day', SUM(a.basis_fee) AS basisFee, SUM(a.post_fee) AS postFee, COUNT(a.beautician_id) FROM mtmydb.mtmy_appt_order a, mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_mapping b WHERE appt_status IN (1, 2, 4) AND a.goods_mapping_id = b.rec_id AND b.service_times != '999' AND b.is_real = 1
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.update_date,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{date},'%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(a.update_date,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(SYSDATE(),interval 1 day),'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.update_date,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(SYSDATE(),interval 1 day),'%Y-%m-%d')
GROUP BY beauticianId,beaOfficeId,year,quarter,month,week,day

SELECT a.rec_id AS mappingId, IF(SUM(c.basis_fee) > SUM(b.total_amount),0,1) AS isExist, SUM(b.total_amount) AS totalAmount, IFNULL(SUM(c.basis_fee),0) AS basisFee FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_mapping a LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_details b ON a.rec_id = b.goods_mapping_id LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_appt_order c ON a.rec_id = c.goods_mapping_id AND c.appt_status IN (1,2,4) WHERE a.service_times = 999 AND a.is_real = 1
AND DATE_FORMAT(date_add(a.reality_add_time,INTERVAL a.expiring_date MONTH),'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{date},'%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(date_add(a.reality_add_time,INTERVAL a.expiring_date MONTH),'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(SYSDATE(),interval 1 day),'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(date_add(a.reality_add_time,INTERVAL a.expiring_date MONTH),'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(SYSDATE(),interval 1 day),'%Y-%m-%d')

(SUM(a.basis_fee)*#{list.totalAmount}/#{list.basisFee}) AS basisFee,
SUM(a.basis_fee) AS basisFee,

INSERT INTO trains.report_shop_goods ( shop_id, parent_ids, year, quarter, month, week, day, goods_id, goods_sale_num, goods_sale_sum, goods_name, goods_image )
SELECT #{list.shopId}, #{list.parentIds}, (SELECT YEAR(a.reality_add_time)) AS 'year', (SELECT QUARTER(a.reality_add_time)) AS 'quarter', (SELECT MONTH(a.reality_add_time)) AS 'month', (SELECT WEEKOFYEAR(a.reality_add_time)) AS 'week', (SELECT DAY(a.reality_add_time)) AS 'day', a.goods_id AS goodsId, SUM(a.goods_num) AS goodsNum, IF(b.channel_flag != 'bm',SUM(a.goods_price),SUM(a.order_amount)) AS saleSum, a.goods_name AS goodsName, a.original_img AS originalImg FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_mapping a LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_orders b ON a.order_id = b.order_id AND b.order_status IN (1, 2, 4) WHERE group_id = 0
AND DATE_FORMAT(b.pay_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{date},'%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(b.pay_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(SYSDATE(),interval 1 day),'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(b.pay_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(SYSDATE(),interval 1 day),'%Y-%m-%d')
AND b.user_id IN ( SELECT user_id FROM mtmydb.mtmy_users WHERE office_id = #{list.shopId} ) AND a.is_real != 0 GROUP BY goodsId,goodsName,originalImg,year,quarter,month,week,day,b.channel_flag
